Key Match Events: The Kings outscored the Jazz 29-14 in the third quarter, including a 14-2 run to end the period.
The Kings broke open the game behind Fox's 10 points after Markkanen didn't come back out for the second half because of back soreness.
Post-Match Reflections: The Jazz have lost their last two home games by a combined 58 points.
The Jazz have lost starting forwards Taylor Hendricks (broken leg) and Lauri Markkanen (back spasms) on back-to-back nights.
Miscellaneous Highlights: DeRozan had his fourth straight game with at least 20 points to begin his time with the Kings.
The Kings shot just 25.8% from 3-point range but hit 65.6% inside the arc.
Others: The Jazz opened the season with four straight defeats.
Rookie Kyle Filipowski got his first extended playing time and scored 12 points.
